page.title: 01HOUSING
page.content: MOST OF OUR AREA IS RESIDENTIAL THERE ARE ROWS OF TERRACED HOUSES, SEMI-DETACHED HOUSES AND QUITE A FEW DETACHED ONES.SOME ARE FAIRLY LARGE WHILE OTHERS ARE QUITE SMALL. JUST OUTSIDE THE CENTRE THERE IS AN AREA OF CONCIL HOUSES,OVERSLADE ESTATE.IT'S NICKNAME IS 'TINTOWN'. THIS IS BECAUSE THE HOUSES' WALLS ARE MADE OF TIN AND THE ROOFS ARE MADE FROM CORRUGATED IRON.THE AGE OF HOUSES RANGE FROM GEORGIAN PERIOD HOUSES TO NEWLY BUILT ONES.A LARGE NUMBER OF PEOPLE LIVING IN RUGBY COMMUTE TO LARGER TOWNS TO WORK. 'TINTOWN'OR OVERSLADE ESTATE WAS BUILT FOR HOMELESS PEOPLE DURING THE WAR.WHEN THE WAR ENDED,THE PEOPLE DIDN'T WANT TO MOVE. A NEW ESTATE CONTRASTING WITH NEIGHBOURING 'TINTOWN' IS HIGHLANDS, WITH SMALL,MODERN,PRIVATE HOUSING.
